attributes.action: Prorogue parliament to allow democracy and our constitution to prevail .
attributes.additional_details:
In 2016 17.4 million people voted to leave the EU. Parliament MUST be prorouged in order for this process to be completed. 
The attorney general has stated this action is LAWFUL.
attributes.background:
The democratic and constitutional laws of Great Britain are severely under threat.
Prorogue parliament to ensure the will of the British people is carried out.
